Thank you @SueDuris @carriemaslen and @JoshVoC - onto the next meeting! #CXChat
@SueDuris A7 Celebrating this career I love so much by sharing my passion with my colleagues. #CXChat

Q6 Why these metrics? You can create an organizational understanding of the overall experience you are delivering. Then identify & diagnose where you need to make adjustments. The metrics can serve as a guide. #CXChat
A6 And don't forget to measure #EmployeeEngagement. If you're staff is not engaged, your customers won't be either! #EX = #CX #CXChat

A6 #NPS, #CustSat, #CustomerEffort, churn and retention rates, lifetime value. All of these together may be more than what is needed. I don't think it's wise to rely on just one. Choose what works best for the outcome you are trying to deliver #CXChat
@carriemaslen @SueDuris Agree. Sharing is caring and you can't do that effectively if you're living in a siloed org, #CXChat
Q5 You also need the right people in the right roles, a defined process and accountability. #CXChat

Q5 It has to start with #culture. The core values for #CX need to socialized and operationalized. You can have all the #CX skill sets in the world, but without the foundation of the strong #CX culture...forget about it #CXChat
@carriemaslen Exactly!

Q4 The combination of the right #CX skills can move you from being a good customer experience professional to a great one. You have the skill set to deliver an unforgettable customer experience! #CXChat
@SueDuris Q3 Yes! #StayCurious

Q3 I think another skill set that is hard to wrap ones arms around, but really critical to a #CX role is the ability to function in the #grayarea. Very little in #CX is black & white. If you're not prepared for that, it can be a game changer #CXChat
@JoshVoC Very true. #CXChat
@SueDuris That's what I'm talking about! #CXChat
Q3 Empathy, critical thinking, data-driven, strategic mind-set, relationship building, story-telling, listening skills, flexibility, adaptability... so many more #CXChat
Q2 Show me the money, the increased SAT/NPS scores, the engagement, the loyalty. Yes! All of that #CXChat
Q2 By doing the job we were hired to do, we can be a huge player in increasing brand value for the company. Live the brand promise and deliver on it #CXChat
Q2 By always remembering that we are the eyes and ears of the customer. If we are in a position to have direct contact w/ customers, we are their mouthpiece for wants and needs #CXChat
@SueDuris Additionally, the #CX dept/team is usually not the money maker or even a revenue stream. "What have you done done for me lately" is a question that requires proof! #CXChat
A1 Very. In many orgs, #CX is still a new or growing focus. We live in the days where the absence of any kind of ROI is the quickest way to be shown the door #CXChat
@SueDuris Hi...I know it. Happy to be here. #CXChat
